data.message: Th big Silence ...Black lives matter too in Africa Blood on your hands for Supporting Dictatorship in Africa...while the people is dying of hunger, Akon, Mary J Blidge, Ne-yo and friends join Dictator Sassou Ngesso's family in Congo brazzaville to party and get a huge  packet of money for playback performances in a country where 80% of people live with less than $2 per day under a 32 years dictatorship...Sell out, shame on y'all
